alert.note: Alert for Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:58PM EDT until June 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR MERCER...SOUTHWESTERN WOODFORD...NORTHWESTERN GARRARD...SOUTHERN ANDERSON...WEST CENTRAL JESSAMINE...NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN BOYLE COUNTIES... At 757 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Harrodsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Danville, Harrodsburg, Ballard, Junction City, Burgin, Willisburg, Mackville, Oregon, Alum Springs and Caldwell Manor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Kentucky. This is a dangerous storm, producing large hail driven by severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.
